Description: Amethyst ovoid lenticular name-bead: pierced longitudinally, inscribed with a cartouche containing the prenomen of Senusret I with epithet above.
Curator's comments: Amethyst beads with the name Kheperkare cf. CG, 52758 = JE 45583, from Dendera; also 'Pennsylvania University Museum Journal' 8 (Philadelphia, 1917). 233, fig. 92; B. Porter & R. Moss, 'Topographical Bibliography of Ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphic Texts, Reliefs and Paintings' V (Oxford: Clarendon Press), 114. Bibliography: H. R. Hall, 'Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs etc. in the British Museum: Volume 1 : Royal scarabs' (London, 1913), 7, no. 68.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (456)
